snippet: Ms. Silva’s big, boisterous semiabstract canvases exude an impressive confidence.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Lauren Silva's first solo gallery show at ZieherSmith.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Silva’s big, boisterous semiabstract canvases exude an impressive confidence.

headline.print_headline: Lauren Silva: ‘I tried to catch the fog. I mist.’
